findings.title: approve
findings.description: The approve function has a potential security vulnerability.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has a vulnerability that allows non-whitelisted wallets to transfer a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom function allowing non-whitelisted wallets to interact with the smart contract.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The 'mint' function is declared as external and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swap functions, including swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens and swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens.

findings.title: Unprotected Function 'manualSync'
findings.description: The 'manualSync' function is declared as external and lacks access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: Some variables are not initialized before they are used.

findings.title: manualrebase
findings.description: The setRebaseFrequency function allows the owner to manually rebase, which can lead to potential security risks if not properly validated.

findings.title: _swapTokensForBusd
findings.description: Private function _swapTokensForBusd allows swapping tokens for BUSD.

findings.title: setEnableAntiBot
findings.description: Function to enable or disable anti-bot feature

findings.title: withdrawAllToOwner
findings.description: Allows owner to withdraw all tokens, potentially leading to loss of funds.

findings.title: Increase Allowance Vulnerability
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function may lead to potential security risks if not properly validated.
